types.html:
roudoudou m (plural roudoudous)

  1. candy consisting of hard caramel set in a small container, usually a plastic or real seashell
    Marie-Jeanne lèche son roudoudou avec délectation.
    Marie-Jeanne is licking her roudoudou with relish.
trans: candy consisting of hard caramel set in a small container, usually a plastic or real seashell
